name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of June 10, a video titled "Beijing boy suspected of stopping campus bullying was insulted and surrounded by three female classmates" became a hot topic.
It is reported that on the morning of June 9, classmates Xu, Li and Zhang and others had a verbal conflict in the classroom due to duty arrangements.
On the evening of June 10, student Li posted a video clip recorded on the spot to the Internet, and wrote that this group of people usually like to target a girl and humiliate the other party's deceased mother, and he really can't stand it. Then Zhang and others called the police.
On the morning of the 11th, the school issued a notice saying that it was actively cooperating with the investigation and would do a good job of comforting students.
An hour later, the school spoke again to say that there was no bullying incident.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Due to a bug in the Twitter system, videos that have been marked as sensitive and violent will still be sent directly and can only be deleted. We apologize for the discomfort caused. Please forgive us.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
A netizen posted an incomplete statistics of injury incidents that occurred in China in May 2023.
(This also includes two or three accidents

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Contributions from netizens
On the afternoon of June 8, Joy City Middle Street, Shenyang, Liaoning Province. A man hung from a high-rise building and threw RMB and letters of complaint outward.
According to the complaint, the man claimed to have reported with his real name that an evil force in Fushun had kidnapped his family. He was wrongly accused of being mentally ill, and he used this method to attract attention.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
June 11, Southampton, UK.
A Hong Konger protesting on the street was beaten by patriotic international students from the University of Southampton, who then posted a video in a WeChat group to show off.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On the evening of June 11, a man in Gaoyou, Yangzhou, Jiangsu, hit people indiscriminately on the street.
According to the person who filmed the video at the hospital, he hit 8 people, 2 died, and 6 people were still being rescued. He even abandoned the car and fled after hitting the car engine, and then posted provocative posts on WeChat Moments. It is said that the man is a mental patient.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Around 7:00 on June 12, Beijing Renmin University High School.
A security guard who was dismissed by the school drove a stolen online car-hailing vehicle into the school, scratched a student on the way, and then hijacked another student.
At 7:55, the suspect was controlled by the public security department, the hijacked student was safely rescued (no obvious external injuries), and the hit student was sent to the hospital for treatment.
The relevant departments are working on it further.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
At 9 am on June 12, a suspected sanitation worker stabbed three people on Jiangcheng Road in the main urban area of Hangzhou over a salary issue.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @EricLiu_USA Because of inertia. When you wake up every day and realize that there are so many people waiting for you, you have to keep going.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Subsequent update
Some netizens sent an inquiry email to the school about this incident. As of 10 am London time on June 12, we received a reply from the school's vice president and chairman and the student center.
The vice president said that the school will conduct a thorough investigation according to procedures, and the school will firmly defend freedom of speech.
The student center said that it will continue to report the problem and suggested calling the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:

Jinjiang Airport, Quanzhou City, Fujian Province

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On June 12, an installation art work of Hubei Academy of Fine Arts was removed by the security team on the grounds that "the content of the work had not been approved."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
In the early morning of June 12, BYD's four stores in Hong Kong all suffered varying degrees of damage.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
User contribution
On June 12, the EU delegation to China's official Weibo account "EU in China" called for the immediate and unconditional release of human rights lawyer Chang Weiping.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizen added: On June 9, the German Embassy also issued a statement calling for the unconditional release of Chang Weiping

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On the afternoon of June 12, a knife attack occurred at Wuhan Business School.

According to the contributor, a boy stabbed his roommate to death because of a personal conflict. The corridor was filled with the smell of blood, and the teacher shouted that no one was allowed to take pictures, and then began to check the mobile phone albums of each dormitory.
